(GraphicsLayer
  (bounds 800.00 600.00)
  (children 1
    (GraphicsLayer
      (bounds 800.00 600.00)
      (contentsOpaque 1)
      (drawsContent 1)
      (children 2
        (GraphicsLayer
          (position 8.00 8.00)
          (bounds 200.00 10.00)
          (children 1
            (GraphicsLayer
              (bounds 200.00 10.00)
              (contentsOpaque 1)
              (drawsContent 1)
              (backgroundColor #F5F5F5)
            )
          )
        )
        (GraphicsLayer
          (position 8.00 0.00)
          (bounds 100.00 100.00)
          (contentsOpaque 1)
          (drawsContent 1)
          (backgroundColor #90EE90)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
